articles.author: Richard Snow
articles.title: USD/JPY Breaches ‘Line in the Sand’ Ahead of BoJ Meeting - DailyFX
articles.description: The yen continues to depreciate, adding pressure to Japanese authorities to respond. Will recent wage growth and yen weakness bring the inflation target within reach?
articles.content:
Japanese Yen (USD/JPY) Analysis
  • The yen breaks into the danger zone ahead of the BoJ meeting
  • USD/JPY breaches line in the sand
